ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We know that some of you will deny it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We certainly know that some among you do deny it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We certainly know that some among you will give the lie to it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We certainly know that some of you have rejected it
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed We know that some among you are deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, We know that there are some among you that deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And most surely We know that some of you are rejecters.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: but We know that some of you will cry lies.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! We know that some among you will deny (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We know very well that there are some among you who reject Our signs --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily We! We know that some among you are beliers thereof.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We know that there are some among you who deny [it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And We certainly know that there are amongst you those that reject (it).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily, We know that there are some among you that belie (this Quran). [Tafsir At-Tabari, Vol. 29, Page 68]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We know that there are some among you who will belie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And We know that some of you will reject it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, We know that among you are deniers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [69:49] And assuredly We know that some of you, O people, are deniers, of the Qur’ān, and [some of you are] believers [in it].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! We know that some among you will deny (it)) We know that some among you disbelieve in the 691 Qur'an while others believe in it.
